chapter.text: 37|1|Savgand ʙa faristagoni saf ʙa saf [ki ʙaroi parastisi Parvardigor istodaand]
37|2|Va savgand ʙa faristagone, ki aʙrhoro meronand
37|3|Va savgand ʙa faristagone, ki Qur'on tilovat mekunand
37|4|[ki] Be tardid, ma'ʙudi sumo jaktost
37|5|[Hamon] Parvardigori osmonhovu zamin va on ci mijoni onhost va Parvardigori [xursed dar ƣuruʙgohho va] tulu'gohho
37|6|Ba rosti, ki Mo osmoni dunjoro ʙo zevari sitoragon orostem
37|7|Va onro az [dastrasii] har sajtoni sarkas hifz kardem
37|8|[On sajotin hargiz] nametavonand [suxanoni faristagoni] olami ʙoloro ʙisunavand va az har su [ʙo sahoʙhoi otasin] tirʙoron mesavand
37|9|[Az vurudi onon ʙa olami faristagon cilavgiri mesavad va hamvora ʙa] aqiʙ ronda mesavand va azoʙi covidon [dar pes] dorand
37|10|Magar kase, ki nogahon cize [az guftugui faristagon]-ro duzdida gus dihad, ki [dar in surat] sahoʙi duraxson uro dunʙol mekunad

37|11|Az onon [kofiron] ʙipurs, ki ojo ofarinisi [pajkarhoi] onon saxttar ast jo on ci ki Mo [az zaminu osmonho va cahoni ʙekaron] ofaridaem; [dar hole ki] Mo onhoro az gili [ʙearzis va] caspida padid ovardem
37|12|Tu [az inkori onon] dar sigifti va onho [niz suxanonatro dar ʙorai qijomat] masxara mekunand
37|13|Va cun pand doda savand, namepazirand
37|14|Va cun nisonahoi [dar mavridi rostguii Pajomʙar] meʙinand, [onro] ʙa tamasxur megirand
37|15|Va megujand: «In [Qur'on cize] nest, magar codue oskor
37|16|Ojo hangome ki murdem va xok va ustuxon sudem, ʙarangexta xohem sud
37|17|Ojo padaroni mo [niz ʙarangexta mesavand]?»
37|18|Bigu: «Ore, sumo, dar hole ki xor hasted [zinda mesaved]»
37|19|Pas, [vuqui qijomat] tanho ʙo jak ʙong [-i sahmnok] ast va nogahon [hama az qaʙrho ʙerun meojand va dar intizori dasturi Parvardigor, vahsati qijomatro] nazorat mekunand
37|20|Va megujand: «Voj ʙar mo! In [hamon] ruzi cazost»
37|21|[Gufta mesavad: Ore] in hamon ruzi dovariest, ki duruƣas meangosted»
37|22|[Ba faristagon gufta mesavad] «Kasonero, ki [ʙo sirk ʙa xes] sitam kardand,jo ʙo [hamfikron va] hammonandhojason
37|23|va on ci ʙa coi Alloh taolo meparastidand, gird ovared va ʙa rohi duzax hidojatason kuned
37|24|Va ononro nigah dored, ki, hatman, [pes az raftan ʙa duzax] ʙozxost xohand sud
37|25|[Az duzaxijon mepursand] «Caro [monandi dunjo] az jakdigar himojat namekuned?»
37|26|Balki imruz [hamagi] taslim [-i amri Parvardigor] hastand
37|27|Va sarzaniskunon ʙa jakdigar ru meorand
37|28|[Va ʙa rohʙaron va ʙuzurgoni xud] megujand: «Sumo [ʙaroi ʙa kufr kasonondani mo ʙo iddaoi dini rostin va] az coniʙi haq ʙa suroƣamon meomaded»
37|29|[Rohʙaronason] Megujand: «Mo muqassir nestem], ʙalki sumo xud imon nadosted
37|30|Va mo hec tasallute ʙar sumo nadostem; ʙalki sumo xud guruhi sarkas ʙuded
37|31|Pas, [aknun] farmoni mucozoti Parvardigoramon ʙar mo muhaqqaq suda va ʙa rosti, mo [hamagi azoʙi duzaxro] casandaem
37|32|Pas, sumoro gumroh namudem [caro ki] dar haqiqat, xud niz gumroh ʙudem»
37|33|Pas, jaqinan on ruz hamai [onon] dar azoʙ sarikand
37|34|Be tardid, Mo ʙo gunahkoron incunin [raftor] mekunem
37|35|Onon ʙudand, ki cun ʙa eson gufta mesud: «Ma'ʙude [ʙarhaq] cuz Alloh taolo nest» sarkasi [va takaʙʙur] mekardand
37|36|va meguftand: «Ojo mo ma'ʙudonamonro ʙa xotiri [suxani] soire devona raho kunem?»
37|37|[Cunin nest] ʙalki u haq [tavhid]- ro ovarda va pajomʙaroni [pesin] – ro tasdiq kardaast
37|38|Sumo [kofiron], hatman, azoʙi dardnoki [duzax]-ro mecased
37|39|Va cuz [dar ʙaroʙari] on ci mekarded, mucozot namesaved
37|40|Hama azoʙ meʙinand, magar ʙandagoni muxlisi Alloh taolo
37|41|Onon [dar pesgohi Parvardigor rizqu] ruzii musaxxase dorand
37|42|[Anvoi] mevaho [-ro dar ixtijor xohand dost] va giromi dosta mesavand
37|43|Dar ʙoƣhoi purne'mati [ʙihist]
37|44|Dar hole ki muqoʙili jakdigar ʙar taxtho [takja zadaand]
37|45|come az saroʙi noʙ [va zulol] peromunason megardonand
37|46|[Saroʙe ravsan va] safed, ki ʙaroi nusandagonason lazzatʙaxs ast
37|47|[Saroʙe, ki xumori va] sardardi dar nusidanas nest va az on mast namegardand
37|48|Va nazdason zanoni durustcasm ast, ki [ tanho ʙa savharoni xud] nazar dorand
37|49|[Zanon cunon safedandomand, ki] gujo tuxm [-i parandagon] hastand [va zeri par va ʙoli onho az dastrasii hamagon] pinhon mondaand
37|50|[Bihistijon dar ʙorai rujdodhoi dunjo suhʙat mekunand va] ʙarxe az onon pursiskunon ru ʙa ʙarxe digar mekunand
37|51|Jake az onon megujad: «Man [dar dunjo] hamnisine dostam
37|52|[U pajvasta] Meguft: Ojo tu voqean [ʙa qijomat] ʙovar dori
37|53|Ojo hangome ki murdem va xok va ustuxon sudem, ojo haqiqatan [zinda mesavem va ʙa xotiri korhojamon] ʙa mo kajfar medihand?»
37|54|[Sipas, ʙa dustoni ʙihistias] megujad: «Ojo [sumo niz hamrohi man] sar mekased [to ʙidonem u kucost]?»
37|55|On goh xudi u sar mekasad va uro dar mijoni duzax meʙinad
37|56|Ba u megujad: «Ba Alloh taolo savgand, ki nazdik ʙud maro [ʙo vasvasahoi kufromezat] noʙud sozi
37|57|Agar ne'mati [hidojati] Parvardigoram naʙud, man niz az hozirsudagon [dar duzax] ʙudam»
37|58|[On goh ʙa ʙihistijon megujad] «Ojo mo digar marge naxohem dost
37|59|cuz margi naxustin, va azoʙ namesavem
37|60|Ba rosti, ki in hamon komjoʙii ʙuzurg ast
37|61|Ahli amal ʙojad ʙaroi cunin [podos] ʙikusand
37|62|Ojo in [ne'mati ʙihist, karimonatar va] ʙaroi paziroi ʙehtar ast jo daraxti zaqum [dar duzax]
37|63|Be tardid, Mo on daraxtro mojai ozmoisi sitamgoroni [musrik] dodaem [caro ki megujand: «Hec daraxte dar otas namerujad»]
37|64|Dar haqiqat, on [mojai azoʙ] daraxte ast, ki az ƶarfoi duzax merujad
37|65|Mevahojas [cunon ʙadmanzar ast, ki] gujo sarhoi sajotin ast
37|66|Onon [duzaxijon] az [mevahoi talxi] on mexurand va sikamhoro az onho anʙosta mekunand
37|67|On goh rui in [ƣizoi nopok, ʙa coji nusidani] omezahoi az oʙi cuson dorand
37|68|Sipas, jaqinan, ʙozgastason ʙa duzax ast
37|69|Onon padaroni xudro gumroh joftand
37|70|Va [hamcunon] dar paji onon mesitoftand
37|71|Va, hatman, qaʙl az onon niz ʙestari pesinijon gumroh sudand
37|72|Va ʙe tardid, Mo mijonason husdordihandagon [-i ʙisjor] firistodem
37|73|Pas, ʙingar, ki sarancomi husdorjoftagon ci guna ʙud
37|74|[Hama giriftori azoʙ sudand] magar ʙandagoni muxlisi Alloh taolo
37|75|Nuh ʙa dargohi Mo duo kard va [Mo] ci naku icoʙatkunanda ʙudem
37|76|Va u va xonavodaasro [ʙo hamrohi mu'minon] az ʙaloi ʙuzurgi [tufon] nacot dodem
37|77|Va [pas az tufon, faqat pajravoni mu'min va] xonavodai uro [dar zamin] ʙoqi guzostem
37|78|Va ʙarojas dar mijoni ojandagon [nomi nek] ʙar coj nihodem
37|79|Salom [va sitoisi] cahonijon ʙar Nuh ʙod
37|80|Ba rosti Mo nakukoronro, incunin, podos medihem
37|81|Be tardid, u az ʙandagoni mu'mini Mo ʙud
37|82|On goh digaronro [ki dar tufon monda ʙudand] ƣarq kardem
37|83|Va, hatman, Iʙrohim az pajravoni u [Nuh] ʙud
37|84|[Jod kun az] hangome ki vaj ʙo dili pok [va xoli az sirk] ʙa [dargohi] Parvardigoras omad
37|85|On goh ki ʙa padar va qavmas guft: « Ci cize meparasted
37|86|Ojo ʙa coji Alloh taolo in ma'ʙudoni duruƣinro mexohed
37|87|Gumonaton dar ʙorai Parvardigori cahonijon cist?»
37|88|Sipas nigohe ʙa sitoragon afkand [va andesid]
37|89|Va guft: «Man ʙemoram [va dar casn sirkat namekunam]»
37|90|Mardum uro tark kardand va raftand
37|91|On goh pinhoni nazdi ʙuthojason raft va [ʙo tamasxur] guft: «Cize namexured
37|92|Sumoro ci sudaast, ki suxan namegued?»
37|93|Sipas ʙo dasti rosti xud zarʙahoi [muhkam] ʙar onho vorid ovard [va cuz ʙuti ʙuzurg hamaro sikast]
37|94|Pas, qavmas sitoftand va ʙa suji u omadand
37|95|[Iʙrohim] guft: «Ojo cizero, ki xud metarosed, meparasted
37|96|Va hol on ki Alloh taolo [ham] sumo va [ ham] on ciro ancom medihed ofaridaast
37|97|[Vaqte ʙutparaston az posux darmondand] Guftand: «Barojas ʙinoi [ʙaland] ʙisozed va uro dar otas ʙiafkaned»
37|98|Pas, ʙaroi [noʙudii] u najrang xostand, [vale] Mo ononro past va [maƣluʙ] soxtem [va otas ʙar Iʙrohim sard va ʙeasar sud]
37|99|Va guft: «Man ʙa sui [sarzamini digare ʙaroi iʙodati] Parvardigoram meravam va U hidojatam xohad kard
37|100|Parvardigoro, ʙa man [farzande] az soistagon ato kun»
37|101|Mo [duojasro mustacoʙ kardem va] uro ʙa tavalludi pisari ʙurdʙore ʙasorat dodem

37|102|Va cun [Ismoil] ʙa [sinni navcavoni va] haddi talos [va hamkori] ʙo u [Iʙrohim] rasid, ʙa vaj guft: Pisaram, dar xoʙ [ʙa man vahj mesavad va] meʙinam, ki turo zaʙh mekunam. Nazarat dar in ʙora cist?» [Ismoil] guft: «Padarcon, on ciro ki ʙa tu amr sudaast ancom ʙideh. Insoalloh maro [dar ʙaroʙari in farmon] sikeʙo xohi joft»
37|103|Pas, cun har du taslimi [farmoni Parvardigor] sudand va [Iʙrohim] uro ʙo guna [ʙar xok] nihod
37|104|Ba u nido dodem, ki «Ej Iʙrohim
37|105|Jaqinan xoʙatro tahaqquq ʙaxsidi». Mo nakukoronro cunin podos medihem
37|106|Be tardid, in [xoʙ] ozmoise oskor ʙud [va Iʙrohim az on sarʙaland ʙerun omad]
37|107|Va [coni] uro dar ʙaroʙari qurʙonii ʙuzurge ʙozxaridem
37|108|Va ʙarojas dar mijoni ojandagon [nomi nek] ʙar coj nihodem
37|109|Salom ʙar Iʙrohim
37|110|Mo nakukoronro cunin podos medihem
37|111|Be tardid, u az ʙandagoni mu'mini Mo ʙud
37|112|Va uro ʙa [tavalludi] Ishoq, ki pajomʙare az soistagon ʙud, ʙasorat dodem
37|113|[Mo] Ba u va Ishoq ʙarakat dodem, va [ʙarxe] az afrodi dudmonason nakukor ʙudand va [ʙarxe digar] oskoro nisʙat ʙa xestan sitamgor ʙudand
37|114|Va ʙa rosti, ʙar Muso va Horun minnat nihodem
37|115|Va on duro hamrohi qavmason az anduhi ʙuzurg [sitami Fir'avn va xatari ƣarq sudan dar Nil] nacot dodem
37|116|Va joriason kardem, to piruz sudand
37|117|Va ʙa on du kitoʙi ravsangar [Tavrot] dodem
37|118|Va ʙa rohi rost hidojatason kardem
37|119|Va ʙarojason dar mijoni ojandagon [nomi nek] ʙar coj nihodem
37|120|Salom ʙar Muso va Horun
37|121|Mo nakukoronro cunin podos medihem
37|122|Be tardid, on du ʙandagoni mu'mini Mo ʙudand
37|123|Va, hatman, Iljos [niz] jake az pajomʙaroni [Mo] ʙud
37|124|[Jod kun az] Hangome ki u ʙa qavmas guft: «Ojo [az Alloh taolo] parvo namekuned
37|125|Ojo [ʙuti] «Ba'l»-ro [ʙa parastis] mexoned va ʙehtarin ofarandaro raho mekuned
37|126|Alloh taolo [-ro tark mekuned], ki Parvardigori sumo va Parvardigori padaronaton ast»
37|127|Ammo uro duruƣgu angostand va musallaman, [ʙaroi azoʙ] hozir karda mesavand
37|128|Magar ʙandagoni muxlisi Alloh taolo
37|129|Mo ʙarojas dar mijoni ojandagon [nomi nek] ʙar coj nihodem
37|130|Salom ʙar Iljos
37|131|Ba rosti, Mo nakukoronro cunin podos medihem
37|132|Be tardid, u az ʙandagoni mu'mini Mo ʙud
37|133|Va hatman, Lut [niz] jake az pajomʙaroni [Mo] ʙud
37|134|[Jod kun az] hangome ki u va hamai xonavodaasro nacot dodem
37|135|Magar pirazane, ki az ʙoqimondagon [dar azoʙ] ʙud
37|136|Sipas digaronro halok kardem
37|137|Va sumo [dar safar ʙa sarzamini Som] suʙhgohon ʙar [vajronahoi sahrhoi] onon meguzared
37|138|va saʙongoh. Ojo nameandesed [va iʙrat namegired]
37|139|Va, hatman, Junus [niz] jake az pajomʙaroni [Mo] ʙud
37|140|[Jod kun az] hangome ki [ xasmgin az kufri qavmas, ʙiduni icozati Parvardigor] ʙa kistii anʙosta [az musofir va ʙor] gurext
37|141|Pas, [cun kisti dar holi ƣarq sudan ʙud, Junus hamrohi musofiron ʙaroi ʙerun andoxtani ʙarxe afrod] qur'a andoxtand va ʙozanda sud [va uro ʙa darjo andoxtand]
37|142|Sipas mohii [ʙuzurge] uro ʙal'id [furu ʙurd], dar hole ki [xudro ʙa xotiri tarki vazifa] sarzanis mekard
37|143|Pas, agar dar zumrai tasʙehgujoni [Parvardigor] naʙud
37|144|Jaqinan, to ruze, ki [mardum] ʙarangexta mesavand, dar sikami on [mohi] ʙoqi memond
37|145|On goh uro dar hole ki [za'if va] ʙemor ʙud ʙa sarzamini xusk [va ʙegijoh] afkandem
37|146|Va ʙar [sari] u ʙutai kadu rujondem [to az soja va mevahojas ʙahra girad]
37|147|Va [duʙora] uro ʙa suji sad hazor nafar jo ʙestar [ʙa risolat] firistodem
37|148|Pas, onon imon ovardand va Mo niz to muddate [az ne'mathoi zindagi] ʙahramandason soxtem
37|149|Pas, az eson [musrikon] ʙipurs, ojo duxtarho ʙaroi Parvardigori tu va pisarho ʙaroi onhost
37|150|Ojo Mo faristagonro duxtar ofaridem va onho huzur dostand
37|151|Ogoh ʙos! Onon az [rui tuhmat va] duruƣgui
37|152|megujand: «Alloh taolo farzand dorad» va, jaqinan, duruƣ megujand
37|153|Ojo [Alloh taolo] duxtaronro ʙar pisaron tarceh dodaast
37|154|Sumoro ci sudaast? Ci guna hukm mekuned
37|155|Ojo [nameandesed va] pand namegired
37|156|Ojo [ʙar iddaoi ʙotili xes] daleli ravsane dored
37|157|Pas, agar rostgued, kitoʙatonro ʙijovared
37|158|[Musrikon] ʙajni U [Alloh taolo] va faristagon, xesovandi qoil sudaand; dar hole ki faristagon ʙa jaqin medonand, ki [musrikon ruzi qijomat ʙaroi hisoʙrasi] ehzor mesavand
37|159|Alloh taolo az on ci [musrikon] tavsif mekunand, munazzah ast
37|160|[Mardum dar tavsifi Parvardigor, suxani gazof megujand] magar ʙandagoni muxlisi Alloh taolo
37|161|Pas, sumo [musrikon] va on ci meparasted
37|162|[hargiz] gumrohgari [kase az dini haq] nested
37|163|Magar on ki [ʙa taqdiri ilohi] ahli duzax ʙosad
37|164|Va [faristagon megujand]: « Hec jak az mo nest, magar on ki maqomi musaxxase [dar pesgohi ilohi] dorad
37|165|Moem, ki [ʙaroi parastis va nijois ʙa dargohi Parvardigor] ʙa saf istodaem
37|166|Va ʙe tardid, moem, ki tasʙehgui [U] hastem»
37|167|Va [kofiron, pes az ʙi'sat] hamvora meguftand
37|168|«Agar kitoʙe az [kitoʙhoi osmonii] pesinijon nazdamon ʙud
37|169|jaqinan, az ʙandagoni muxlisi Alloh taolo mesudem»
37|170|Ammo [hangome ki pajomʙar ʙo Qur'on ʙa sujason omad, haqqonijati] onro inkor kardand; pas, ʙa zudi [naticai in korasonro] xohand donist
37|171|Va hatman suxanoni Mo dar ʙorai ʙandagoni firistodaamon az pes sodir sudaast
37|172|Onon, hatman, az coniʙi Mo jori sudaand
37|173|Va ʙe tardid, laskari Mo piruzand
37|174|Pas, [ej Pajomʙar] to muddate az onon [musrikon] ruj ʙigardon
37|175|Va ononro [dar hangomi nuzuli azoʙ] ʙingar; pas, ʙa zudi xud [niz naticai kufrasonro] xohand did
37|176|Ojo onon azoʙi moro ʙa sitoʙ xostorand
37|177|On goh ki [azoʙi ilohi] ʙar xonahojason furud ojad, ci ʙad ast ʙomdodi husdorjoftagon
37|178|Va to muddate az onon ruj ʙigardon
37|179|Va ononro [dar hangomi nuzuli azoʙ] ʙingar; pas, ʙa zudi xud [niz naticai kufrasonro] xohand did
37|180|Pok va munazzah ast Parvardigorat - Parvardigori izzat va qudrat-az on ci [musrikon ʙa duruƣ] vasf mekunand
37|181|Va salom ʙar pajomʙaron
37|182|Va sipos [va sitois] az oni Alloh taolo- Parvardigori cahonijon- ast
